description: Create a single ball with the specified attributes. A model domain must be specified prior to ball creation. While cycling, balls can only be created before cycle point 0 (i.e., when the timestep is calculated).

keywords.name: id
keywords.description: Specify ball ID (auto-assigned if not given)

keywords.name: group
keywords.description: Assign ball to group s in slot (default slot if not specified)

examples.description: Create ball at position (1,2,3) with radius 0.5

examples.command: ball create radius 1.0 position-x 5.0 position-y 5.0 id 100
examples.description: Create ball with ID 100 at position (5,5,0) with radius 1.0
Create ball at origin in group 'mygroup'
